item.title: CLOSED - Fixed
item.dc:creator: @I_Love_College I Love College
item.description:
@I_Love_College wrote:

Hey guys, I recently downloaded a Delta cleaned client to learn a lot of the basics of Java and RSPS so alot of you may think that i’m really stupid asking this.
The first thing i’m trying to do is add the commands string so i put this

[code=java] private void customCommand(String command) {

}[/code]

And added this command inside it

if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

But when i do the command, nothing happens although it shows up in the server Cmd prompt that i typed it in as a command. I’m pretty sure that i have to declare what customcommand does somewhere but i’m not to sure where.

Read full topic
